import React,{useState}from'react';import{BrowserRouter as Router,Routes,Route,Navigate}from'react-router-dom';import Login from'./components/Login';import Dashboard from'./components/Dashboard';// Simple Auth Helper
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProtectedRoute=_ref=>{let{children,user}=_ref;if(!user)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/login"});return children;};function App(){const[user,setUser]=useState(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user')));const handleLogin=userData=>{localStorage.setItem('user',JSON.stringify(userData));setUser(userData);};const handleLogout=()=>{localStorage.removeItem('user');setUser(null);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Router,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{style:{padding:'10px',borderBottom:'1px solid #ccc',display:'flex',justifyContent:'space-between'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"RestoBook"}),user&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["Hello, ",user.name," (",user.role,") "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLogout,children:"Logout"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/login",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Login,{onLogin:handleLogin})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProtectedRoute,{user:user,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Dashboard,{user:user})})})]})]})});}export default App;
